Log Success
Get Latest Attendance
func:
// Get UID and Station (fallbacks only for testing)
const uid = flow.get("uid") || 'AS1234';
const station = flow.get("station") || 'Trim';

// Build query: compute minutes safely from epoch ints
msg.topic = `
SELECT
  staff_id,
  station,
  ts_in,
  ts_out,
  TIMESTAMPDIFF(
    MINUTE,
    FROM_UNIXTIME(CASE WHEN ts_in  > 9999999999 THEN ts_in / 1000 ELSE ts_in END),
    FROM_UNIXTIME(CASE WHEN ts_out > 9999999999 THEN ts_out / 1000 ELSE ts_out END)
  ) AS work_minutes
FROM attendance
WHERE uid='${uid}'
  AND station='${station}'
  AND ts_in  IS NOT NULL
  AND ts_out IS NOT NULL
  AND ts_out > ts_in
ORDER BY ts_out DESC
LIMIT 1`;
return msg;
